text: The 32nd King's Cup were held from 10 – 17 February 2001 at Bangkok, Thailand. The King's Cup (คิงส์คัพ) is an annual football tournament; the first tournament was played in 1968. Sweden won the tournament beating China 3–0 in the final. ==Venue== All matches held at the National Stadium in Bangkok, Thailand {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! title: 2001 King's Cup
